title: 16B.052 AUTHORITY TO TRANSFER FUNDS.
text: The commissioner may, with the approval of the commissioner of management and budget, transfer from an internal service or enterprise fund account to another internal service or enterprise fund account, any contributed capital appropriated by the legislature. The transfer may be made only to provide working capital or positive cash flow in the account to which the money is transferred. The commissioner shall report the amount and purpose of the transfer to the chair of the committee or division in the senate and house of representatives with primary jurisdiction over the budget of the Department of Administration. The transfer must be repaid within 18 months.
